name: Educa Touch
description: Educa Touch keeps families in touch with whats happening at their childs education service, and encourages a shared understanding of the childs learning. The Educa Touch app requires an Educa account to log in.  What is Educa? Educa is a web-based portfolio of a childs growth and learning development. It allows parents and early childhood teachers to share a childs journey and gain valuable feedback. It is built with recommendations from early childhood teachers and parents.  I love that I can instantly send photos and snippets from the day to parents using Educa Touch. This saves me so much time.  Educa Touch for Families - Quickly view updates about what your child has been learning during the day. - Read newsletters and notices for your service anywhere.  - Receive push notifications on your device whenever something new is posted. - Comment on new posts instantly.  Educa Touch for Educators and Staff - Quickly post photos and stories about the children you are teaching.  - Record videos and audio recordings to share rich learning memories with parents.  - Quickly view new posts and updates shared by your colleagues.  - Receive and send push notifications whenever something new is posted. - Comment on new posts instantly.
